<Text: No. 227 Radar Station RAAF was a Royal Australian Air Force radar station located at Yanchep, Western Australia.>

Text: No. 227 Radar Station RAAF:  Established during World War II to provide early warning of Japanese air raids against Perth, the radar station was formed in 1942–43 and operational by late 1943.
